desc: Natural, handmade goat milk soaps, body butters, salves and bath luxuries.

layout.text: Sisters Soap Kitchen and Let's Loosen Up!...We Welcome You!!

We are a small business located in Grand Haven, Michigan specializing in handcrafted goat milk soaps, body butters, soothing balms, healing salves and bath luxuries. We use the finest ingredients sure to keep your skin happy and healthy! Our Let's Loosen Up! line offers a variety of soothing topical Salves, Quick Sticks Salves, Sugar Scrubs, & Bath Bombs handcrafted with natural ingredients including a hemp derived CBD crystal isolate with ZERO THC. Grown in Colorado, USA!!
